extension-param.param-value: style:#site-translate-header-wrapper{width:100% !important; height:44px; position: fixed; top:0;}#site-translate-header-wrapper p{font-size:10px;line-height: 12px;}#site-translate-message{display:table-cell; height:44px; vertical-align:middle; width:5000px;} article#container { top:49px; position: absolute; width: 100%; } div#container { margin: 44px auto 0; } #gHeader { margin: 0;top: 48px;} nav {top: 390px;} body#default { background: url(http://yurien.com/common/images/visual_default_img_bg.jpg) no-repeat center 30px,url(http://yurien.com/common/images/bg.png) repeat-x #FFF;} div#footer div#footer_header {width: 980px;} div#footer div#footer_header div#footer_header_etc {width: 810px; }
